metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37519 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in authfile.c memcached 1.6.9 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted authenticattion file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a minor issue, an attacker would have to be able to create an auth file, and even so, it will result only in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: memcached: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
